item.title: The Challenges and Benefits of Contemporary Romance: Legal Ramifications of Algorithmic Online Dating
item.description:
Tessa Sophie Hoffmann & Chrisa Alexiou (University of Groningen) Photo credit: Jack Sexton, via Wikimedia commons Introduction As Tony Milligan wisely observed in 2011, love is a complex emotion, capable of bringing immense joy and unexpected delight, but also capable of causing pain and disappointment. While the pursuit of love has existed long before the digital age, technology and artificial intelligence (AI) have dramatically changed the landscape, with over 48 million Europeans turning to dating platforms to find potential partners...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-challenges-and-benefits-of-contemporary-romance-legal-ramifications-of-algorithmic-online-dating/
